original: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs /

translated: The Means of Accomplishing Black Yamāri

original: dang po'i zhig bde ba'i stan la nye bar gnas par gyur ba'i sgrub pa pos yi ge aam dmar po las nges par grub pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rang gi snying la rnam par bsgom la /
analyzed: dang po'i zhig bde ba'i stan la nye bar gnas par gyur ba'i sgrub pa pos yi ge aam dmar po las nges par grub pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rang gi snying la rnam par bsgom la /
translated: The practitioner, who has gone to a solitary, comfortable seat, should visualize a sun maṇḍala definitely accomplished from a red letter aṃ in his heart.

original: de'i steng du yi ge h'um mthing nag rnam par bkod de /
analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge h'um mthing nag rnam par bkod de /
translated: On top of that, he should arrange a dark-blue letter hūṃ.

original: h'um gi 'od zer gyis gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa'i bla ma dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dmigs la /
analyzed: h'um gi 'od zer gyis gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa'i bla ma dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dmigs la /
translated: With the light rays of the hūṃ, he should visualize the gurus, buddhas, and bodhisattvas, such as Yamāntaka,

original: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod cing phyag kyang 'tshal la /
analyzed: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod cing phyag kyang 'tshal la /
translated: and he should make offerings to them with flowers and so forth and also pay homage to them.

original: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams byas te stong pa nyid bsgom par bya bas na /
analyzed: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams byas te stong pa nyid bsgom par bya bas na /
translated: Having gone for refuge to the Three Jewels and so forth, he should meditate on emptiness.

original: aom stong pa nyid ye shes kyi rdo rje'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nga yin no bar ro //
analyzed: aom stong pa nyid ye shes kyi rdo rje'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nga yin no bar ro //
translated: “ I am the nature of the vajra of the gnosis of emptiness.”

original: de'i rjes la yi ge aom dmar po las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: de'i rjes la yi ge aom dmar po las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: After that, one should visualize a red letter oṃ, from which arises a sun mandala upon which is a letter hūṃ.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug to sngon po yi ge h'um legs par gnas pa rnam par bsgom par byas la //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug to sngon po yi ge h'um legs par gnas pa rnam par bsgom par byas la //
translated: That completely transforms into a blue club marked with a vajra, upon which is a letter hūṃ.🔽One should visualize that the light rays of the letter hūṃ invoke all the tathāgatas, who enter into the hūṃ.

original: yi ge h'um gi 'od zer gyis bskul ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyis de dag thams cad yongs su gyur pa las brkyang bskum gyis gyur pa'i gshin rje gshed spro ba dang bsdu ba'i gzugs kyis padma 'dab ma brgyad
analyzed: yi ge h'um gi 'od zer gyis bskul ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyis de dag thams cad yongs su gyur pa las brkyang bskum gyis gyur pa'i gshin rje gshed spro ba dang bsdu ba'i gzugs kyis padma 'dab ma brgyad
translated: From that all completely transforms into Yamāntaka, who is standing with one leg extended and one leg drawn in, in the form of emanating and reabsorbing.

original: sna tshogs pa'i steng na nyi ma la bzhugs nas ma hi rsha la bcibs pa bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i steng na nyi ma la bzhugs nas ma hi rsha la bcibs pa bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: One should visualize him standing on a sun on the variegated lotus with eight petals, riding on Mahīrṣabha.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbyug to sngon po ste /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbyug to sngon po ste /
translated: Then, in the heart of the Bhagavān, on a sun mandala, the letter hūṃ completely transforms into a blue club marked with a hūṃ.

original: yi ge h'um las kun nas byung ba'i 'od zer gyis skye dgu rnams kun du snang bar byas nas slar yang de nyid la legs par gzhug go //
analyzed: yi ge h'um las kun nas byung ba'i 'od zer gyis skye dgu rnams kun du snang bar byas nas slar yang de nyid la legs par gzhug go //
translated: Light rays arise from the syllable hūṃ and illuminate all living beings, and then return and enter into that [syllable].

original: rim pa de de lta bu dag gis ji srid 'dod kyi bar du spro ba dang bsdu bar yang bya ba'o //🔽dam @29a * //🔽tshig la sogs pa cho ga bzhin du byas pa sngon du 'gro bas thun tshod gnyis sam gsum mas bzhir de ltar bsgom par bya ba'o //

translated: In this way, one should expand and withdraw [the light rays] as much as one wishes.

original: aom hr'i:shtri:bi kri t'an na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i:shtri:bi kri t'an na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Having performed the ritual of the commitments and so forth, one should meditate in this way for two or three watches of the day, four watches of the day.

original: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzla bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzla bar bya ba'o //
translated: One should recite this mantra:🔽oṃ hrīḥ śrīḥ vikṛtānana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs so /
analyzed: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs so /
translated: This is the sādhana of Black Yamāri.
